about_the_game:
What is Necrosis: Dawn of Dread?

Immerse yourself into a terrifying new chapter of online co-op survival horror that blends classic gameplay principals with modern mechanics. Bring up to three players, find essential supplies, survive horrific combat encounters, and solve intricate puzzles in this modern throwback to classic survival horror.


Unique Gameplay Experience

NDOD offers the claustrophobic helplessness and frantic gameplay of old school survival horror games, and packages it in new way that is accessible to a new generation of gamers. You'll desperately engage in a struggle for survival as supplies dwindle dangerously low and you fight to keep each other alive.

Heart Pounding FPS Action

NDOD gets up close and personal with FPS action and features a wide variety of weapons to choose from. Managing your limited amount of powerful weaponry will be a key component to survival.

Puzzles

NDOD features puzzles that will challenge your mind and keep you engaged. The puzzles are designed to provide levels of interactivity that other multiplayer games simply can't match. You'll need to be a good detective in addition to a skilled gunslinger to survive in NDOD.

Character Selection Mechanic

Build your dream team via our character selection mechanic. Each of our 9 characters has a unique role and ability. Will you heal your team? Bring powerful weapons to the mission? Protect your teammates from attack? Debuff enemies for the team? Engage in melee combat? Mix and match characters to find the ideal synergy that works for you.


Huge Environments

NDOD checks all of the boxes when it comes to classic survival horror environments. Our session based gameplay model makes it easy to change up the scenery and explore different levels. There is no padding in NDOD, every minute is engaging content. NDOD launches with eleven huge levels, with several more planned as free post release content.

Randomized Encounters

NDOD is designed to be enjoyed over and over again in manageable online sessions with your friends. You'll enjoy bringing new players to the game and watching the chaos that ensues. Enemy spawns, items, and some puzzles have randomized elements that will keep you guessing and the experience fresh.

Achievements and Unlockables
Complete achievements to unlock cosmetics. We do not do microtransactions, and you cannot pay to win. Play the game well, and be rewarded for it.



Leaderboards
Compete to earn the fastest time in the leaderboards, and prove yourself as a survival horror master.

Single Player Mode

A single player mode is available, but players are strongly encouraged to play NDOD as it was intended: a co-op multiplayer experience.

No Corporate Interference, Ever!

NDOD is developed by an extremely small team. There will be no microtransactions, no intrusive DRM, you will never have to log into any third party server, and NDOD has no external dependencies aside from Steam and Unreal. This game will never be shut down by us. Buy the game once, and play it forever.

Automatcher
No friends?, no problem! Hop in the automatcher queue and roll the dice. You may be matched with a professional survivor. Utilize our proximity VOIP or text based chat to formulate a strategy and achieve victory in the face of overwhelming odds. 

Community
Visit our website and join us on Discord to find new friends and allies.

Long Term RoadmapNDOD is not a cash grab. We do not answer to shareholders. NDOD is a passion project built carefully by dedicated people with drive to see a vision become a reality. Our future includes an aggressive post release content schedule roadmap with plans to release additional levels, characters, and enemies for free.

name: Necrosis: Dawn of Dread

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card
  • Storage: 21 GB available space

short_description: Necrosis: Dawn of Dread is a co-op, first person shooter, survival horror adventure game. Featuring inventory management, puzzle solving, combat, and exploration. NDOD is a throwback to classic survival horror fun, blended with modern gameplay mechanics to create a unique experience.
